alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:42AM EST until January 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Additional snowfall of 4 to 8 inches, with up to 10 inches possible in the most persistent lake effect bands. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult, with locally near whiteout conditions possible at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
